description: Base 5 expansion uses each positive digit just once.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3000
mathematica: Union[ Map[ Plus@@(Array[ (5^#)&, Length[ # ], 0 ]*#)&, Flatten[ Table[ Permutations[ Join[ Range[ 5-1 ], Array[ 0&, k ] ] ], {k, 0, 1} ], 1 ] ] ]
